algorithms



compare_func

typedef int (*compare_func)(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C typedef
description: function pointer for comparison:
-1: a < b
0: a == b
1: a > b

c_compare_bool_func

int c_compare_bool_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: compare bool a & bool b

c_compare_i8_func

int c_compare_i8_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: compare int8 a & int8 b

c_compare_ui8_func

int c_compare_ui8_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: compare uint8 a & uint8 b

c_compare_i16_func

int c_compare_i16_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: compare int16 a & int16 b

c_compare_ui16_func

int c_compare_ui16_func(const void *a, const void *b);
type: C function
description: compare uint16 a & uint16 b

int c_compare_i32_func(const void *a, const void *b);

c_swap

void c_swap(void *a, void *b, void *swap, size_t size);
type: C function

C_VOID_GET

#define C_VOID_GET(array, size, n) (void *)((uintptr_t)array + (uintptr_t)((n) * (size)))
type: C preprocessor definition

c_array_reverse

void c_array_reverse(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count);
type: C function
description: reverse an array

c_array_is_sorted

bool c_array_is_sorted(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: return true if array is sorted based on function

c_array_sort

void c_array_sort(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: sort array using function

c_array_quicksort

void c_array_quicksort(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: quicksort array using function

c_array_mergesort

void c_array_mergesort(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: merge sort array using function

c_array_find

uint c_array_find(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data);
type: C function
description: find index of data in array, returns C_INVALID_INDEX if not found

c_array_sorted_find

uint c_array_sorted_find(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: find index of data in sorted array, returns C_INVALID_INDEX if not found

c_array_sorted_insert_index

bool c_array_sorted_insert_index(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, void *data, compare_func function, uint *out_index);
type: C function
description: find index to insert data in sorted array, returns true if index can be added, false if index already in data

c_array_max

uint c_array_max(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
description: find max value in array

c_array_min

uint c_array_min(void *array, size_t item_size, size_t item_count, compare_func function);
type: C function
